## Title
GUI Calculator

## Description 
GUI calculator built using Kivy 2.1.0

## Purpose  
To learn the basics of the Kivy GUI framwork

## Requirments
Python ^3.9 
Kivy 2.1.0

## How to Install
`pip install calculator-beau28713`

## How to run
`python -m calculator_beau28713`
